title: AgentContract
description: Self-declaration contract for specialist review agents. Each agent declares its identity and when it should run.

id.description: Unique identifier, lowercase. Used in --{id} flag. Must be unique across all agents.

prefix.description: Finding ID prefix, uppercase. Used to generate finding IDs like SEC-001.

category.description: Category for findings. Typically matches the id.

always.description: If true, this agent always runs regardless of project type (e.g., security, testing)

requires.description: Conditions for auto-selection. Supports equality, :contains (for arrays), and :in (for enums).

presets.description: Preset flags that include this agent. E.g., ['prelaunch', 'frontend']

applicability.description: Declares when this agent should run
